Reviews.Title: So Far so good
Reviews.Author: Roger A. Hermann "Roger In Chicago"
Reviews.Content: I needed a phone that I could use when traveling to Europe. So GSM was the requirement. I had been using a Droid on Verizon's network. I do like the Android OS better. However this phone has a lot of features for a low price. The WIFI lets me get online or check my email when near a hotspot without having to have a data plan. I really like the lock button on the side of the phone because my droid kept calling people randomly when the screen did not lock. The phone arrived promptly and I have yet to travel to Europe to verify that it will work with a network there, but I am quite sure it will.

Reviews.Title: Software on the phone is no user friendly. Beware of  warranty
Reviews.Author: Jiju Raj "JR"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone couple of months ago; honestly I hate this phone for couple of reasons.1. Once you dial a number,  phone's software auto locks the screen by not allowing to do anything, (for example if we need to dial an extension or activate speakerphone)it becomes harder because of the screen locking software. It is default software and it cannot be disabled sadly.2. Some time the reception signal is very bad it would not automatically come up whereas phone needs to be rebooted.3. US customer's please don't be fooled by international warrant, because Samsung USA will not support you even for small technical help.4. Web browser is poorly built (hard to read) and by default it is made for Vodophon network.My recommendation is please spend couple of hundred dollars extra and buy a better phone.5. Only good part of this phone is its design. No doubt this phone is sleek and eye pleasing.Hope this review would help.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: PyP
Reviews.Content: I bought this cellphone unlocked because i need it to use it in the US with a sim card form Argentina, and then when i travel there it "would work", im complete happy with it, it works even better than what i thought, its easy to use, the touch screen is very fast, nice camera, i love the "lock key" in one of the side as my last cellphone was always calling people from my contact list.... I was surprised how light weight  the cellphone is, i complete love it :)

Reviews.Title: Not So Connected
Reviews.Author: De
Reviews.Content: I love the features of the phone. It works well. It has a great battery life. So I am not totally disappointed, and I will keep the phone. But, I can already see that I will end up getting something else that has more social netowrking capabilities. The phone is equipped with apps like facebook and twitter, but I have to constantly log on to the site to be notified of any updates. I am use to my other phone that had notifications sent to my phone anytime I had a request or a message from any website. The phone doesn't link to facebook contacts or calender. My instant messaging applications are always logging themselves off and it doesn't alert me if someone sends me a message. I find the phone actually to be sort of basic. It is no where near up to par as social networking can be. It has a foward facing camera, but no applications like skype or google talk that actually work with it. I am going to China, and staying connected with people back home is important. This phone doesn't garantee that at all.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: 1-of-Many
Reviews.Content: Great Product And Fast Shipment...I Was Skeptical At First But Overall Iam Very Pleased...The Touch Screen is very responsive and handles like a dream. I do hope though that the company put some thought into making their manually more useful.

Reviews.Title: the best phone
Reviews.Author: playa
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best phone i have ever own. I have a blackberry 8520 and the features are not even near to the S5620. Samsung i give you two thumbs up on this product, LOVE IT LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: i love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Brad White
Reviews.Content: If you can live without qwerty and android/iphone apps and don't do a lot of net browsing, this is the best unlocked phone out there for the money.  excellent features (3mp camera and video, up to 16g storage, WIFI, GPS, great music player, fm radio with recording, excellent battery life, and also a great phone!.. high quality, fun to use, fits nicely in the pocket. had it for 3 months now and only issue is with browsing the web- limited memory and clunky interface.. otherwise great.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: emeka
Reviews.Content: The phone is very nice. The only problem i discovered is that if i didn't press the key lock it will call people without my knowledge.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG NOT HONORING WARRANTY
Reviews.Author: Harry Calahan
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE WAS FINE . IT DID EVERYTHING IT SAID IT WOULD DO . THE ONLY PROBLEM IS THAT THIS PHONE CAME WITH AN INTERNATIONAL WARRANTY . IN THIS CASE THIS UNLOCKED PHONE WAS MADE IN THE UNITED KINGDOM , ENGLAND FOR THOSE WHO DIDN'T KNOW WHAT THE UNITED KINGDOM WAS, AND NOT MEANT TO BE SOLD IN THE USA BY SAMSUNG. I THINK IT HAS SOMETHING TO DO WITH AGREEMENTS WITH THE PHONE CARRIERS AND SELLING EVERYONE A DATA PLAN . THIS UNLOCKED PHONE DOES NOT NEED A CONTRACT TO FUNCTION BUT SAMSUNG WILL NOT HONOR THE WARRANTY FOR THIS PHONE IF YOU ARE ANYWHERE ELSE OTHER THAN THE UNITED KINGDOM . I SENT IT BACK AND THE SELLER WAS HAPPY TO REFUND MY MONEY THREE MONTHS LATER . AND HE REALLY DIDN'T HAVE TOSamsung S5620 Black Monte Unlocked Quad-Band GSM Phone with 3 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, E-Mail and Stereo Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - International Version - Black.THANK YOU JAKE.

Reviews.Title: Great if you arent looking for entertainment!
Reviews.Author: Cdp2001
Reviews.Content: This phone has great video/picture quality, coloring is great. Unfortunately it doesnt have qwerty and isnt in the Android market. I ordered it and the instruction manual was in Indian, so therfore if you cannot read Indian and order this phone, look online and you will not find this phone on the Samsung website unfortunately! But it does look as Sexy as the Picture!!!

Reviews.Title: Stylish and excellent qiality
Reviews.Author: Mohammed N. Jinnah
Reviews.Content: When i ordered this item I was confused.But i did order it as I was in need of a cell phone. It looked different. But when i got it in my hand i was so happy as i like its shape and of course I became finally 100% pleased when I turned it on and use it for a week. Nice vibrating touch scree and display is so good!

Reviews.Title: Java based
Reviews.Author: Paul "Paul"
Reviews.Content: the phone is java based, meaning it's no compatible with whatsapp and another cool apps, pay 20$ more and buy the mini galaxy which is much better

Reviews.Title: My wife seems to like it a lot
Reviews.Author: Ethosian "You never have to wait for anything...
Reviews.Content: 1) the price was good2) unlocked phone with no contract, so we reload it with T-mobile minutes every time my wife runs low3) probably costs us $10.00 per month on minutes (and my wife has a ton of girlfriends calling her, but they mostly call the house)4) looks nice and works fineNo complaints.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Everything Sends defective products
Reviews.Author: pat rye
Reviews.Content: Nothing was wrong with the phone at all except that the dealer (Wireless Everything) sent it with a charger that did not work at all, so it could not be charged lucky enough I had a compatible charger at home. The phone is nice :))

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: Maryam Mohammadi
Reviews.Content: Mine basically did not wrk. Did not hold the charge and after 1 minute working would shut down on you. The seller did not have any more of it so I had to just return it. It was disappointing because the phone looked very nice and slick but just did not work.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I haven't had it for too long, so, I'm still learning how to use it, but so far everything it's great!

Reviews.Title: Cellphone
Reviews.Author: gabriel dell arciprete
Reviews.Content: Very old model. No android software. Low quality cam. Unprogramable. Very difficult to find headphones (special for this item). Not recommeded.

Reviews.Title: way outdated
Reviews.Author: Vamsi
Reviews.Content: thought it would be a worthy gift. With the present smartphones in market, this is way outdated and is NOT AT ALL WORTH the price. no software updates. no third party apps that could be installed. Poor batter power. Nasty display compared to present iphone,galaxy displays. My friend was totally upset with the gift and he thoroughly didnt like it. Who ever buys this any-longer is just a fool like me. You get way better smartphones for the same 200$.

Reviews.Title: Phone worked as advertised
Reviews.Author: Mac
Reviews.Content: Purchasing open box was a good choice. Saved money and received a quality phone. Identical new phone purchased a year ago and worked well for wife so I decided I would get one. Do not text or use data. Just make phone calls. Wi-Fi on phone if needed. Built in FM radio is great. Camera works. Lots of Apps if needed. Instructions, charger, ear buds and USB cable with disc included. Not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: just I  can't install Garming Software to this cellphone
Reviews.Author: Antonio
Reviews.Content: generally the product is really good and in perfect conditions but I could never install the GPS garming software.thanks

Reviews.Title: Great Buy for the Price
Reviews.Author: Road Romeo
Reviews.Content: Great buy for the price, if you are not a applications freak, this is the right phone. I got this for my Dad and this is his first touch screen phone and he is loving it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome cellphone
Reviews.Author: umesh suneja
Reviews.Content: The cellphone has all features. Worth for money as compared total costOverall the cellphone is good by SAMSUNG>Only drawback : Keyboard in not QWERTY.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: macks
Reviews.Content: i bought this samsung s5620 and i got it on time, well packed. i love it and am happy with about it. get urself one and have the fun. thanks

Reviews.Title: Great Phone !!!!
Reviews.Author: Geminilady
Reviews.Content: I waited to post my review, because I purchased this phone last November 2011, as a Christmas gift for a friend of mine in Jamaica.He loved it very much. So I decided to purchase another one for my boyfriend who will be going to Jamaica too.

Reviews.Title: All ok
Reviews.Author: Maravilla
Reviews.Content: Todo muy bien, no tuve ningun problema y fue entregado en el tiempo estipulado, el celular es muy bueno y lo que esperaba. Gracias.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: bryanG93
Reviews.Content: Bought two unlocked phones, neither were unlocked and one was broken. Feel lied to and i hope i can get what i paid for or get a full refund.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Johnson
Reviews.Content: I just got this cellphone for only two monthes, up to now, every thing is OK except for the GPS function.

Reviews.Title: Best Phone for the Money
Reviews.Author: Lon K. Willits
Reviews.Content: I bought this unlocked phone to use here in the USA and in other country's. My local carrier works fine. As I use the phone I like it better and better. For the price this phone can not be beat. From wifi to photos to calling you can not go wrong with this phone. Nokia out did them self's in making this phone. My only concern is will the phone work in other country's. I will be travel to other countrys very soon. I will come back and tell you how the phone did.

Reviews.Title: Good job
Reviews.Author: VP "good service good world"
Reviews.Content: Good work, in the time, location and right item of delivery. This phone is a good item, highly recommendable, but it is not the best, when more money then more best phone in your needs. It is good in call, music, videos, game or even the service of your company. Good job, from the Amazon and the company of this cellphone. God bless, thank you.

Reviews.Title: Can anyone provide the clarity and signal strentgh on the phone
Reviews.Author: Gift Card
Reviews.Content: Did anybody use this phone in the US ?If yes, can anyone provide the clarity and signal strentgh on the phone please ? (don't care about data features, just voice quality and signal).Please let me know. Thank you.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM and 3G HSDPA 900/2100 plus GPRS and EDGE data capabilities.
3 megapixel fixed focus camera; Smile Shot; QVGA video recording at 15 fps; video call camera; 227MB integrated memory; hot-swappable microSD card slot (up to 16GB) in a Latest TouchWiz UI, Smart Unlock.
Wi-Fi; GPS receiver with A-GPS; Bluetooth 2.1 with A2DP; standard microUSB port; 3.5mm audio jack; Accelerometer for screen auto rotate and turn-to-mute; FM radio with RDS; social networking integration Facebook, MySpace and so on.
Up to 9 hours of talk time, up to 780 hours of standby time.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung S5620 Black Monte Unlocked Quad-Band GSM Phone with 3 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, E-Mail and Stereo Bluetooth - Unlocked Phone - International Version - Black
